TopicTitle: Blender Importing into unity - multiple shaders on each object

Articles.Content:
I just finished modelling an engine to bring into unity however, when it imports into unity each object has multiple shaders applied. When i try and remove these, parts of the object disappear and it breaks a lot of texturing. Any help on how to import and keep each object with only 1 shader would be appreciated.
